solution_line_template: Robin ate twice as many buttercream cupcakes as chocolate sauce cupcakes, or {buttercream_multiplier} * {chocolate_sauce} = <<{buttercream_multiplier}*{chocolate_sauce}={buttercream}>>{buttercream}.
So in total she ate {chocolate_sauce} + {buttercream} = <<{chocolate_sauce}+{buttercream}={total}>>{total} cupcakes.
